Class Tree

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class Tree
extends Ground
implements Jumpable, Resettable

    • Tree

      public Tree​(char displayChar, int jumpSuccessRate, int fallDamage)
      Constructor for Tree
      Parameters:
      displayChar - character to display for this type of terrain
      jumpSuccessRate - success rate of jump performed
      fallDamage - damage to be taken when fall

      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor

    • resetInstance

      public void resetInstance()
